docs.text: Enterprise Knowledge Graph This book is about using scalable graph databases to store large-scale connected information for an entire enterprise.

docs.text: Data Layer Raw low-level binary codes that contains information after analysis. Knowledge Layer Connected information. Knowledge Triangle A stack of three layers. At the base is the Data Layer , above that the Information Layer and at the top the Knowledge Layer . Information Layer Data about our key business entities. This includes Things, like People, Places and Events. Semantics The branch of computer science associated with meaning. It can be best understood by understanding the semantic triangle. The key point of the semantic triangle is that we cannot directly associate a label with a refrereent without traversing concepts.
